content: skill level advanced beginner size one size 32 inches x 34 inches materials needed yarnspirations bernat bundle up 100% polyester yarn #4 weight color marshmallow each skein is 4 9 oz /267 yards 140 g/ 244 m machine wash gentle on warm tumble dry on low do not over dry the color and amount used in this blanket are total amount of yarn for the blanket 818 yards 15 oz basically 3 skeins - color a - 818 yds - crochet hook size h 5 00 mm - scissors - yarn needle used for working in loose yarn ends finished size approximately 32 inches x 34 inches this pattern uses us crochet terminology
